text: My son goes to Agape Little Uni since 20 months old (Smart Toddler) and now he is in N2. He is always happy coming back from school. He enjoyed playing with his classmates. And he loves his teachers (Teacher Sam, Teacher Shane) very much. During Meet the Parents sessions, the teachers shared with me critical information about my son’s development and things for me to note and act upon. I would not hesitate to recommend Agape Little Uni to anyone.

We love Agape Little Uni @Upper Serangoon! My daughter has grown so much since she started going there. The place is great for learning and having fun at the same time.She especially loves her teachers, Shane and lǎoshī, Thank you for them as they are caring, hard work and makes learning fun.
We're really happy with Agape little Uni @upper serangoon as all the teachers are very good. I want to express my heartfelt thanks for the wonderful care, your kindness, and patience.

Highly recommend it to other parents. It's a wonderful place for kids to grow and enjoy themselves.

I sent my girl to this school since she’s infant. Special shout out to N1 teacher Yilyn, who’s her English teacher who is caring, loving and dedicated! My girl loves to go school everyday, always excited to share her weekend stories with her teacher. That tells how much she enjoys her school.

There were also activities involving parents , such as Mother’s Day and Father’s Day event. Where we get to bond with her friends’ families as well as school teachers. It’s so heart warming to see the bunch of bubbly kids playing together and knowing they are so happy at school.

Keep up the good work, all the teachers!
